description: Welcome to this modern 3 bedrooms, 4-level townhome in desirable Willoughby Heights! Open-concept living with a gourmet kitchen featuring quartz countertops, gas range, premium S/S appliances & a large island perfect for entertaining. Designer laminate floors throughout. Upstairs, the luxurious primary bedroom offers a private balcony, spa-like ensuite with double sinks & an oversized WIC. Enjoy a spacious 553 sq ft private rooftop patio with gas hookup. Double side-by-side garage with storage & EV charger. Complex includes gym, clubhouse & playground. Easy Hwy access & shopping nearby! 2 pets allowed.
